Kaplan Vacation 2018

More than a Language School It’s an adventure

Contact an advisor

Imagine Learning English Here

Learning a language should be an adventure. Our exciting activities and excursions are more than a fun extra; they are an integral part of the learning journey. Gain a deeper immersion in English as you explore the incredible world around you. Who knows where you’ll be, or what you’ll be doing, when you realise … you can speak English?

Liverpool Contact an Advisor

  • Sunset over New Brighton lighthouse – just one of the excursions offered by our Liverpool school
  • General English course (20 lessons/week), including accommodation and registration fee
Price from (2 weeks)
£9,000
Was £9,999 | Save £999

  • The salt marshes of Brooklyn Bridge Park offer a different angle on a famous skyline. Study at our New York SoHo school and start exploring
  • General English course (20 lessons/week), including accommodation and registration fee

£9,000

  • Man O’War Beach, on England’s Jurassic Coast – one of the amazing places to visit when you study at our Bournemouth school
  • General English course (20 lessons/week), including accommodation and registration fee

Create your own package

How do you want to spend your time? Choose your perfect destination, course and accommodation

Your Destination

What’s your ideal study location?

The heart of the city – or a sun-drenched beach? London’s Covent Garden – or the top of the Empire State Building? Choose the perfect place from our amazing range of destinations

Your English Course

How do you really want to study?

Whether you want to boost your skills dramatically in a short space of time, pass a specific exam, or simply pick up the basics whilst having some fun, Kaplan can cater to your individual needs.

Your Accommodation

What feels like home for you?

Feeling at home is crucial to your learning experience. Whether you prefer to live with other students or with a native family, all of our student homes are safe, social, well-maintained and located close to both schools and city centres.

Contact an Advisor For more information
